sentence: The Foundry and Broad St Grill have good food and great service albeit a little on the pricy side
The price is affordable and one of the nicest cleanest and modern hotels I have visited
The hotel was nice and the bar with its happy hour prices was very good evening band a little too loud
Excellent room rates for a full service hotel including a nice Sunday arrival discount
Well worth more than the price I paid
Also the Foundry was a great place to get a drink appetizers at Happy Hour price

Quality room good food friendly efficient stafi definitely will stay here again its out of main traffic areas but close to everything great water pressure in shower reasonable prices for a high end hotel
In my opinion it is not worth 1800 per night if some of the spa treatments were part of this price that may make it worth more
Attached Broad Street Grill had the slowest service even for a buffet but the food was good though pricey
I do not like to pay to park
The food for the Valentines Day dinner was expensive 99 for two and we made our reservations online thinking that we were going to be able to order from the menu
Having to pay an attendant prior to exiting is OK until you are at a function and 60 people all leave at the same time
arrived at event at 7 30 pm paid extra for room close to event site
He offered to find another room but this would be of charge

The fact that the front desk manager who I emailed twice never bothered to contact me or return my emails leads me to believe she felt I would just let the issue go I will not be staying at this hotel ever again due to the double charge that took a week to correct
I felt like I paid a high price for a low in hotel room
If sleeping on a cement block is what you are looking for with flat pillows than this over priced stay is just for you
